eligibility.engineering: Master's Degree in Engineering/ Technology or equivalent with minimum CGPA 6.5 or 60%, B.E/B.Tech/B.Pharm with 70% and GATE/NET score, Master's Degree in relevant science discipline with minimum CGPA 6.5 or 60%
eligibility.science: Master's degree in Sciences with minimum 65% marks or CGPA 6.5, Master's in Engineering/Technology with minimum CGPA 6.5 or 65%, BE/B.Tech/B.Pharm with 70% and GATE/NET score
eligibility.humanities: Master's degree in relevant discipline with 60% or 6.5 CGPA (or 55%/6.0 CGPA) with UGC/CSIR-NET/NBHM
eligibility.management: MBA/P.G. Diploma in Management of 2-year duration with 60% marks or CGPA 6.5; 70% for scholarship

application_instructions.fees: Rs. 500/- for OP/OBC-NCL/EWS, Rs. 300/- for SC/ST/PwD (non-refundable)

selection_procedure: Online application, provisional shortlisting, online test (MCQ, UG & PG level), online interview; GATE/NET may be exempted from test
